overview: An infant girl named Hannah is abducted by her grandmother Barbara Thomas. Hannah's father David Overton, convinced that Barbara is the head of a coven of witches, inaugurates a desperate nationwide search for his missing daughter. However, David may have a sinister agenda of his own, as indicated by the fact that his wife recently died under mysterious circumstances.
tagline: Based on the true case of a young girl's abduction by her grandparents in Victoria, this tele-movie stars Cameron Daddo as the father desperate to get his daughter back and Jacqueline Bisset as the manipulative grandmother with an interest in the occult.
cast: Jacqueline Bisset|Alexandra Schepisi|Cameron Daddo|Jerome Ehlers|Suzi Dougherty
